short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cloud-based Applicant Tracking System - One platform to manage your human resources and customers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vultus Recruit Google Chrome plug-in works with Gmail and Office 365. This plugin allows you to add candidates via parsing, add contacts, create openings, add accounts and send mass mails.
